About Us

We are a team of web professionals who provide St. Paul small businesses with the web solutions they need.

Meaning of 25/8

The rate of change in the web landscape is quite rapid where instead of 24/7 (24 hours a day, 7 days a week) we upped the ante.

What We Do

We provide web solutions, fairly vague, let's try that again.

If you haven't noticed, many businesses online rarely limit their activities to simply having a website. That is because it's tough to figure out:

  • where to start
  • what you need
  • how to make it happen

Web Development

No matter the route you're looking to take online, having a web developer on hand is a wonderful thing.

Web Design

Art is art, but the difference between art and design is that design is meant to be functional. To keep all of the design functionally inline, we highly suggest the use of a design system.

Web Strategy

Things built and developed for the web can be delivered, but what makes the investment payoff on either front is a solid web strategy to back up the functional coherency.
